paragraph.paragraph:
The project properties are accessible from the Visual Studio .NET
ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfPropertyBrowser.htm properties window . To view the properties window:
Select an EiffelEnvision project item in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog.htm Solution Explorer .
Choose View, Properties menu.
The properties window may also been shown for any selected item by pressing the F4 keyboard shortcut or by choosing Properties from the project context menu.
For project configuration properties, see ../index.xml Configuring EiffelEnvision Projects .

Name
The name given to the EiffelEnvision project.

Project File
The full path to the corresponding EiffelEnvision project file that holds the selected project's ../index.xml project configuration settings.

Project Folder
The full path to the selected project's root location. Typically this is the location on disk where the EiffelEnvision project file is stored.
